p: The aim of using repellant compound towards hematophagous pest is to reduce the frequency of biting in endemic areas and prevent bites in areas where allergic reactions to biting insects are common ( 41). Very few studies have been conducted to evaluate insect repellent activities of essential oils against bed bugs ( 17, 27). More tolerance of bed bugs against insect repellents were compared with other blood-sucking insects ( 27).
